title: Album Page, "Sketch of Third Window, Second Story, Possibly at Abbey of Chiaravalle, Milan", late 19th century
medium: Graphite on very smooth, off-white wove paper tipped into binding with fabric
inscribed: Recto, in graphite, bottom right: 85; top left: third window; below sketch: 4th window back of 3rd window; cloister de Chiaravalle / ... de Milan; bottom right of right sheet: 85; verso of left sheet: 97.
dimensions: Sheet: 30.4 x 20.6 cm (11 15/16 x 8 1/8 in.), irregular
description: Vertical sheet illustrating a sketch of a window with two small arched openings and a ball finial above.  To the right is a cross-section, possibly of the molding for the window seen at left.

tombstone.epitaph:
Album Page, "Sketch of Third Window, Second Story, Possibly at Abbey of Chiaravalle, Milan", late 19th century.
late 19th century. Graphite on very smooth, off-white wove paper tipped into binding with fabric. Gift of Mrs. William Greenough. 1943-51-259.
